document_data.mainbody:
immator was a lordling in Galadorna during the mid-8 century DR.
After reporting on the murder of the trader Anlavas Jhoavryn in Nethra during the year , the watch captain Rhoagalow confided in seneschal Elminster Aumar that he believed Baron Limmator was behind that killing. Elminster didnt seem to disagree Limmators reputation was such that he was said to be the only lordling busier with shady doings than Maethor.
